cardDescription: Outline the layout and plant selections for the garden.
Purchase a variety of seeds for the planned garden.
Till and enrich the soil in the garden area for optimal plant growth.
Plant the seeds or seedlings in the prepared soil according to the plan.
Set up a suitable irrigation system to ensure proper watering for the plants.
Regularly check the plants' growth, address any issues, and provide necessary care.
Carefully harvest the mature vegetables from the garden.
Begin constructing a sturdy fence around the garden area to protect it from animals.
